Faking It

Faking It

  • “The Rational Design Process: How and Why to Fake it”
    • by David L. Parnas and Paul C. Clements
  • The Bad News
    • we will never find a process that allows us to design software in a perfectly rational way
  • The Good News
    • we can fake it
    • we can present our system to others as if we had been rational designers
    • it pays to pretend to have been rational during development and maintenance
